{
  "explanation": "The description mentions storing the email address for several specific purposes: when the shopper logs into the store, authenticates their wishlist, or subscribes for a back-in-stock alert. These activities primarily involve communication management (e.g., sending an email for notifications), service registration (e.g., collecting information for account creation), and account management (e.g., managing user accounts). Each of these purposes is focused on interactions directly with the shopper and leveraging their email address for these actions.",
